metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.code_html:
public class Main {
  final int x = 10;

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    Main myObj = new Main();
    myObj.x = 25; // will generate an error: cannot assign a value to a final variable
    System.out.println(myObj.x);
  }
}

content.text: The final keyword is a non-access modifier used for classes, attributes and methods, which makes them non-changeable (impossible to inherit or override).
content.html: The final keyword is a non-access modifier used for classes, attributes and methods, which makes them non-changeable (impossible to inherit or override).

content.text: The final keyword is useful when you want a variable to always store the same value, like PI (3.14159...).
content.html: The final keyword is useful when you want a variable to always store the same value, like PI (3.14159...).

content.text: The final keyword is called a "modifier". You will learn more about these in the Java Modifiers Chapter .
content.html: The final keyword is called a "modifier". You will learn more about these in the Java Modifiers Chapter.

content.text: Read more about attributes our Java Class Attributes Tutorial .
content.html: Read more about attributes our Java Class Attributes Tutorial.
